name: express_es6_dashboard_starter
description: A starting point for an ES6 React Webpack project

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/babel-node ./node_modules/babel-istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --dir ./public/coverage ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- ./test --recursive && echo Coverage report available at: "file://$(pwd)/public/coverage/lcov-report/index.html"

author: Rob Brennan <rob@therobbrennan.com>
